name: The OmniGallery
description:
The OmniGallery is an expanding multiverse of art exhibits, committed to collecting the great works of art of the past, present and future.
Explore each universe and get as close as you want to the art, no velvet ropes here.

The Classic Hill features some of the best of “Pre-Modern” art, like painting by Da Vinci, Van Gogh and Klimt, alongside 3D scans of beautiful marble sculptures.
The Diorama-Rama explores different expressions of 3D art, from 3D figures to 3D scans, almost 100 pieces to enjoy and get lost in.
And the brand new Main Hall, the entrance and home to the portals into each universe.

Many upcoming exhibits are on development, the next ones being The Vault and Bay of Tokens (2021 Q3).
If you enjoyed your visit, please consider donating or supporting Eternal Echoes.
This could be just sharing on Instagram (@EternalEchoesVR), donating directly on the website, buying NFTs at OpenSea or getting my personal gallery, The Surreal Imaginarium, here on Steam.
As an Indie Dev, all help is welcome!
Enjoy!
